DOC.criteria: VOLUNTEER INCLUSION CRITERIA : Volunteers able enroll : Have ability understand sign inform consent . Are able willing give blood sample . Are healthy determine study Investigator . Have chronic disease . Do exhibit clinical indication diabetes . PARTICIPANT INCLUSION CRITERIA : Participants able enroll : Have ability understand sign inform consent . Are able willing give blood sample . Have clinical diagnosis diabetes base one follow criterion : 1 . Documented history plasma glucose value great equal 210 mg/dl three different occasion . 2 . Fasting blood sugar great equal 150 mg/dl three different occasion . 3 . Documented history ketoacidosis . 4 . Insulin dependency . 5 . Documented history abnormal glucose tolerance test . EXCLUSION CRITERIA : Neither volunteer participant eligible : Are age 10 . Have severe systemic disease ( ) compromise ability obtain adequate examination . Have follow ocular characteristic condition eye : 1 . Opacities ocular medium , limitation pupillary dilation problem sufficient preclude good , quality stereo fundus photograph . 2 . Ocular disease confound assessment diabetic retinopathy advance agerelated macular degeneration , central serous choroidopathy , optic atrophy , retinal vein occlusion , active uveitis , significant explain unexplained visual field loss , type retinopathy retinal degeneration . 3 . Chronic requirement ocular medication disease , glaucoma .
